terms.term: Relabel - identify obsessions/compulsions for what they are
Reattribute - assign cause of thoughts/urges as OCD
Refocus - respond to thoughts/urges in constructive way
Revalue - conscious/non-automatic dismissal of obsessions/compulsions, resume normal/constructive life
Orbital Cortex - Error Detection. Short stimulus from pavlovian learning. Long stimulus when expected outcome of behavior was negative when expected positive.
Cingulate Gyrus - Gut sensation of fear/dread. Amplifies orbital cortex signals.
Caudate Nucleus - Automatic Transmission for Thinking. Held "open" in OCD.
